h2_title: How to Get the Elder Armourworm Spirit
content: Once unlocked, Zodiac Village is where you can find all of the 'shop' NCPs, like the Xu Dog, Shen Monkey, and a new blacksmith character named Yin Tiger. Chen Loong will also reside there.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Elder_Armourworm_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Elder Armourworm Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'How to Get the Elder Armourworm Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
Once unlocked, Zodiac Village is where you can find all of the 'shop' NCPs, like the Xu Dog, Shen Monkey, and a new blacksmith character named Yin Tiger. Chen Loong will also reside there.
